content.rendered:
Directed by David Nutter.

Written by Steven Moffat. Steven Moffat. Audrey Niffenegger. Audrey Niffenegger.

Cast  Theo James( Henry DeTamble ) . Everleigh McDonell( Young Clare Abshire ) . Gui Agustini( Henry’s Acting Double ) . Natasha Lopez( Charisse ) . Jaime Ray Newman( Lucille Abshire ) . Michael Park( Philip Abshire ) . Caitlin Shorey( Young Clare Abshire ) . Desmin/ep Borges( Gomez ) . Marcia DeBonis( Nell ) . Peter Graham( Mark Abshire ) . Kate Siegel( Annette DeTamble ) . Josh Stamberg( Richard DeTamble ) . Jason David( Young Henry DeTamble ) . Brian Altemus( Young Henry DeTamble ) . Shawna Hamic( Isabelle ) . Spencer House( Jason ) . Taylor Richardson( Alicia Abshire ) . Finn Brown( Young Mark Abshire ) . Carol Mazhuvancheril( Matt ) . Chelsea Frei( Ingrid ) . Major Attaway( Waiter ) . Will Brill( Ben ) . Robert Ray Manning Jr.( Passerby ) . Peter Francis James( Dr. Felman ) . Karma Jenkins( Clare’s Friend ) . Jeannette Blackwell( Lady on the Street ) . Lianah Sta. Ana( Ruth ) . Gabriella Reyes( Off Camera Opera Singer ) . Stephen Dale( Yelling Man ) . Karon Stewart( Lady on the Train ) . Lewon Johns( Cop ) . Kaya Rosenthal( Helen ) . Tim Lajcik( Biker ) . Luciano Acuna Jr.( Young Guy ) . John Marinacci( Gas Station Patron ) . Alison Barton( Donna ) . J.Y. Chun( Store Employee ) . Nic Inglese( Man at Bar ) . John E. Denaro( Priest 1979 ) . Claire Lilley( Blonde Woman ) . Raymond Hamlin( Cameraman ) . Gerrard Lobo( Librarian ) . James Hindman( Priest 2008 ) . Joanna Parson( Church Official ) . Finnerty Steeves( Realtor ) . Adam Shippey( Harvey ) . Adeline Turco( Young Alicia Abshire ) .Hannah Cruz .Douglas Goodhart .Nayanna Holley .Miles James .Jason Morales .Devin Sanchez .Toni Scruggs .Danielle Summons .Danielle Withers . Catherine Gambeski( Party Girl ) . Robert Mercado( Biker ) . Sharon Jorrin( Biker Bar Patron ) . Evie Cecile Johnson( Art Student (uncredited) ) . Ken Holmes( Downscale Young Person (uncredited) ) . Saffron Cooper( Art Museum Patron (uncredited) ) . Robert Loftus( Library Patron (uncredited) ) . Mark Rome( Party Goer (uncredited) ) . Greg Collins( 1980s Businessman (uncredited) ) . Josh LaCount( Best Man (uncredited) ) . Walter Wiz Nichols( Nosey Neighbor (uncredited) ) . Brad Neilley( Churchgoer (uncredited) ) . Joshua Graverholt( Sax Player (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Sarah Rath. Joseph E. Iberti. Tom Lavagnino. Brian Minchin. Steven Moffat. David Nutter. Sue Vertue. Patty Willett. Audrey Niffenegger.

Production Hartswood Films. Home Box Office (HBO). Warner Bros. Television.

 

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 6

Status Finished (2022–2022)
